ygData.subject: A final word

The missles struck the cave's shields, shaking the cave itself, rocks 
and dirt fell from the ceiling, sparks erupted from an electronics 
console, the cave took the abuse and Phobia laughed. "Those stupid 
maximals don't know when to quit" he thought as the battle raged on.

Again he attempted to land the Maximals good side "Why did you insist 
on firing on an ally? If you don't believe I'm on your side you can 
check with Kluster." he'd play his wild card now and discard the next 
round.

(Goodnight soulstice we'll continue this tomorrow.)

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "THECODE" <thecode@p...> wrote:
> Diskus flew in the way of the shot. BAM! He's down again! Blender 
starts

injured
> fire 2 missiles at the Predacon cave. 12 missiles in all heading 
toward the
> Predacon Cave!...

the

this

of

near

She's

holes in

with
